description: This festive sangria is perfect just in time for the end-of-year parties. It has a sweet yet tart flavor that will be sure to keep your guests coming back again and again! While the star of the cocktail is strawberry, you can always add other fruits to make it more delightful to the palate and eyes.
name: Strawberry Pomegranate Sangria
recipeIngredient: 1 lb Strawberries, sliced plus more for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Place the sliced strawberries and arils in a large pitcher.

recipeInstructions.name: Add wine and pomegranate juice. Allow to sit in the refrigerator for 6 – 24 hours.
